JGAL

Class GAL_Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_Handler

  • public class GAL_Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    The GAL_Handler contains the runGAL method, wich execute the Genetic Algorithm with the given configuration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GAL_Handler(GAL_Configuration configuration, int maxGenerations, int populationSize, int windowSize)
      Initializes a new GAL_Handler with a configuration and a maximum number of generations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAverageFitnessFrom(int pos)
      Gets the average fitness for the generation denoted by the int parameter.
      double getAverageFitnessFromAll()
      Gets the average fitness from all generations.
      double[] getAverageFitnessFromEach()
      Gets an array of doubles where each one represents the average fitness for each generation.
      GAL_Chromosome getBestFrom(int pos)
      Gets the best chromosome for the generation denoted by the int parameter.
      GAL_Chromosome getBestFromAll()
      Gets the best chromosome from all generations.
      GAL_Chromosome[] getBestFromEach()
      Gets an array of GAL_Chromosomes where each one represents the best chromosome for each generation.
      int getLastGenerationNumber()
      Gets the number for the last generation to be executed.
      GAL_Population getPopulationFromWindow(int pos)
      Gets an population from the window of population denoted by the int parameter.
      GAL_Population[] getWindow()
      Gets the window of population.
      void runGAL()
      Runs the Genetic Algorithm

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAL_Handler

        public GAL_Handler(GAL_Configuration configuration,
           int maxGenerations,
           int populationSize,
           int windowSize)
        Initializes a new GAL_Handler with a configuration and a maximum number of generations.
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration to be used by the Genetic Algorithm.
        maxGenerations - The maximum number of Generations allowed.
        populationSize - The size of the population.
        windowSize - The size for the window of populations to be remembered.

    • Method Detail

      • runGAL

        public void runGAL()
            throws NotValidChromosomeException,
                   NotValidPopulationException,
                   NotValidOperationException
        Runs the Genetic Algorithm
        Throws:
        NotValidChromosomeException - If the chromosomes can't be created with the actual configuration.
        NotValidPopulationException - If the population can't be created with the actual configuration.
        NotValidOperationException - If an operation can't be done with the actual configuration.
